name: Light & Motion VIS Pro 1000 Front light
description: When there's no time to stop and charge, the VIS Pro 1000 is the solution. It charges in under 2 hours and you can keep the light shining while it's  plugged in to a powerbank.4 modes: high (1.5h at 1000 lumens), medium (3h at 500 lumens), low (6h at 250 lumens) and SafePulse (12h at 500 lumens).SafePulse mode offer improved rider visibility, without the negative side effects of flash modes.Power-through charging, offers 150 lumen pulse while charging from a portable powerbank (not included) and the light is not waterproof while charging.Tool-free mounting system attaches easily to handlebars.GoPro compatible mount included.Quick-release allows the light to click on-and-off the bracket, so you can leave the mount on your bars.Textured reflector puts the powerful focused beam exactly where you want it.Amber peripheral lights add side visibility.Press and hold switch turns off after 2 seconds.IP67 waterproofing means your light is ready for any weather.Accurate battery status indicator so you know when it's time to recharge.Supports 2A USB charging system, cutting charge times in half (2A adaptor not included).Charges via micro USB port, cable is included.
